comment.name: Comment
comment.text:
Afternoon Report

Last Updated: 2/16/26 | 12:55PM


Blue skies? Check. Sunshine making a grand entrance? Double check. Mother Nature is absolutely showing off this afternoon, and honestly, we're here for it.

The temps are climbing and it's been a gorgeous day out there. It's the perfect weather to enjoy a treat outside, like a waffle from Waffle Cabin or donuts from Coffee Hound. If you're looking for something more substantial indoors, the chopped Italian at Sliders or a bowl of Seafood Chowder at Camp sound pretty perfect right now, too.

This afternoon, swing by the Foggy Goggle from 3-6PM for live music. And if you're planning ahead, Wednesday night brings dinner with Eddy and Betty in the Mahoosuc Room at 5:30PM, featuring a performance from Silver Circus. Tickets are on sale now.

Tonight, our grooming team is heading back out to spread the love across 80+ trails. And don't forget the Chondola and South Ridge Express are spinning until 6PM.

We will most definitely see you out there!

-Team Snow

comment.name: Comment 2
comment.text:
Good morning from Sunday River and happy Monday! Lifts are spinning from 8AM-6PM, giving you a full day to explore every corner of the resort, with 139 trails and 880 acres ready for laps.

Our grooming team polished up the resort and that corduroy is looking pretty sweet. We did hear this morning that early turns may feel a little firm, so just keep that in mind as you’re making those first laps of the day.

This afternoon, swing by the Foggy Goggle from 3-6PM for live music. And if you're planning ahead, Wednesday night brings dinner with Eddy and Betty in the Mahoosuc Room at 5:30PM, featuring a performance from Silver Circus. Tickets are on sale now.

When hunger hits, you've got options. Grab something quick and tasty at Double Brew if you're looking to get back out there, or post up at Camp or Sliders if you want to settle in and recharge properly.

We will see you out there!

-Team Snow
